main event: The document is a U.S. Air Force Technical Information Sheet and a Project Blue Book UFO report from 1959, in which two men reported observing an unidentified object approximately 35-40 feet in diameter and 20 feet in height, hovering about 30 feet above the ground before accelerating at a rapid rate and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as making no noise and hovering before accelerating at a rapid rate and disappearing.
The witness reported that there were no civilian aircraft in the area according to various airport towers and radar approach control.
The witness mentioned that there were no civilian aircraft landed at Patterson field at 0415.
The document includes a questionnaire filled out by the witness, providing details such as the date, time of day, the condition of the sky, and the witness's personal information and job.
The incident report suggests thorough investigations including verifications from various aviation authorities and no sighting of any aircraft in the area at that time.
sighted object: unidentified object approximately 35-40 feet in diameter and 20 feet in height
witnesses: Members of Fairborne Plant Protection Group
